home.slogan: Technology Leads the Future, Innovation Drives Development
home.description: Committed to providing innovative technology solutions for clients and driving digital transformation
home.title: Welcome to Our Corporate Portal
paragraphs: We are committed to providing our clients with the highest quality services and cutting-edge technology solutions. Through continuous innovation and effort, we have become a leading enterprise in the industry.

The company adheres to the philosophy of 'People First, Technology Innovation', gathering industry elites and building an efficient professional team. We focus on technology R&D and innovation, providing customized solutions for clients.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Explore Our Story and Mission
about.description: Since our establishment in 2020, we have always adhered to the philosophy of innovation-driven and customer-first, creating卓越 value for clients

intro.title: About Us
intro.text: Chenfeng Software Development Studio was established in 2020, a high-tech enterprise focused on software distribution and technical services. Headquartered in China, the company serves hundreds of enterprises nationwide, providing quality software distribution services and solutions.

culture.title: Corporate Culture
culture.content: We uphold the corporate values of 'Innovation, Collaboration, Professionalism, Win-Win', committed to creating a vibrant and creative work environment. The company encourages employees to continuously learn and innovate, providing broad development space and growth opportunities for employees.

technology.label: Technical Strength
technology.text: Possessing an experienced R&D team, mastering multiple core technologies, and continuously investing in R&D innovation.

service.label: Service Quality
service.text: Customer needs-oriented, providing comprehensive, high-quality technical services and support.

experience.label: Industry Experience
experience.text: Deeply engaged in the industry for many years, accumulating rich project experience and successful cases.

innovation.label: Innovation Capability
innovation.text: Following technology development trends, continuously exploring and applying new technologies and methods.

timeline.title: Sixteen Years of Development
timeline.subtitle: Every step focuses on the pursuit of technology, every year witnesses the共同 growth with customers

2009.title: Company Founded
2009.description: Chenfeng Software Development Studio was officially established, specializing in software testing instruments, forming an innovative R&D team and starting the technology entrepreneurship journey.

2012.title: Technology Breakthrough
2012.description: Launched the second-generation software testing instrument, achieving independent R&D of core technologies, obtaining multiple patent applications, and establishing technological leadership.

2016.title: Capacity Upgrade
2016.description: Established standardized production lines, achieving daily production capacity of 500 units, 100% qualified rate, and technology level reaching international leading standards.

2020.title: Business Expansion
2020.description: Business expanded to automated testing field, selected for National High-Tech Enterprise certification, becoming an industry benchmark enterprise.

2025.title: Global Layout
2025.description: Established partnerships with multiple top international enterprises, achieving automated 24/7 remote testing, establishing global service centers, and exporting products to 30+ countries and regions.

jobs.title: Join Us
jobs.subtitle: Looking for Like-Minded Partners
jobs.description: We are looking for passionate and talented people to join us in creating the future of technology and realizing career dreams
jobs.intro: We are looking for passionate talents to join our team! If you love technology and pursue excellence, welcome to submit your resume.
jobs.applyMessagePrefix: Thank you for your interest in the
jobs.applyMessageEmail: Please send your resume to: qq3484763071[AT]gmail.com

frontend.title: Frontend Engineer
requirementsList: Skilled in Vue.js or React.js frameworks
Understand frontend engineering and modular development
Good code style and teamwork skills

backend.title: Backend Engineer
requirementsList: Proficient in backend languages such as Java/Python/Node.js
Familiar with databases like MySQL, Redis, MongoDB
Understand microservices architecture and distributed systems
Good system design and optimization capabilities

product.title: Product Manager
requirementsList: Excellent requirements analysis and product design capabilities
Skilled in tools like Axure, Sketch
Good communication coordination and project management skills

designer.title: UI/UX Designer
requirementsList: Proficient in design tools like Photoshop, Figma, Sketch
Excellent visual design and user experience capabilities
Understand frontend development processes and design standards

events.title: Event Planning
events.subtitle: Wonderful Events, Participate Together
events.description: We regularly organize various technical exchanges and team building activities to promote learning and growth and team collaboration
events.intro: We regularly hold various technical sharing sessions, team building activities and industry exchanges. Through these activities, we promote team collaboration, improve technical capabilities, and provide employees with better work experience and growth opportunities.
values: Improve professional skills and technical level

summit.title: Annual Technology Summit
summit.description: Gathering industry technology experts to share the latest technology trends and practical experience, discussing future development directions. Inviting well-known lecturers in the industry for keynote speeches.

frontend.title: Frontend Technology Sharing
frontend.description: Team members share frontend development experience, new technology exploration and project practices, learning and growing together. Promoting knowledge exchange and inheritance.

teamBuilding.title: Team Building Activity
teamBuilding.description: Outdoor extension training to enhance team cohesion and promote communication and collaboration among members. Including team collaboration games and extension projects.

training.title: New Employee Onboarding Training
training.description: Provide comprehensive onboarding training for new employees, including company culture, technology stack, development processes, team collaboration standards, etc.

competition.title: Internal Programming Competition
competition.description: Internal programming competition to stimulate innovative thinking and improve programming skills. Multiple difficulty levels are set, and winners will receive generous prizes.

lunch.title: Lunch Learning Exchange
lunch.description: Relaxed lunch time, sharing work insights and learning resources. Promoting cross-departmental exchanges and enhancing understanding among team members.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Gathering Elites, Creating the Future Together
team.description: We have an experienced and technically sophisticated professional team dedicated to providing the highest quality services to clients

intro.title: Professional Team
intro.text: We have a team composed of industry senior experts. Team members have an average of more than 10 years of industry experience, having participated in the development and management of multiple large projects, with deep technical skills and rich practical experience.

advantages: Rich industry experience and project practical ability
Continuous learning and technology innovation team culture
Efficient collaboration and good communication skills
Perfect talent cultivation and growth system
Multiple industry certifications and technical patents
Focus on code quality and development standards

zhangwei.name: Zhang Wei
zhangwei.description: 15 years of software development experience, previously worked at well-known internet companies, led the architecture design and technology selection of multiple large projects.

lina.name: Li Na
lina.description: 12 years of frontend development experience, proficient in various frontend frameworks and engineering practices, focusing on user experience and performance optimization.

wangqiang.name: Wang Qiang
wangqiang.description: 13 years of backend development experience, good at microservices architecture, distributed system design and performance tuning, with deep technical skills.

liufang.name: Liu Fang
liufang.description: 10 years of design experience, good at user experience research and interface design, works have won design awards multiple times, with unique design concepts.

chenjie.name: Chen Jie
chenjie.description: 8 years of operations experience, proficient in containerized deployment, automated operations and cloud platform management, ensuring stable and efficient system operation.

zhaomin.name: Zhao Min
zhaomin.description: 11 years of product experience, good at requirements analysis and product planning, successfully launched multiple user-loved products, with keen market insight.
